news.title: Michael D. Higgins releases music video for 'Against All Certainty', with Ciaran Hinds, Olwen Fouéré, Eanna Hardwicke
news.summary: The full Against All Certainty album, featuring ten original works by the President, will be released on September 5.

news.title: Oasis release ‘Cigarettes & Alcohol' live from Manchester shows
news.summary: After gracing the cover of Hot Press, Oasis has released a recording from the first hometown show of their Live '25 reunion tour.

news.title: Hans Zimmer to score Euphoria season 3 alongside Labrinth
news.summary: Past contributors to the show’s soundtrack include James Blake, Lana Del Rey and Billie Eilish.

news.title: Sprints release two new songs 'Rage' and 'Beg'
news.summary: Check out the new singles and videos below.

news.title: Malaki to perform at launch of new CitizenM hotel in Dublin
news.summary: DOOM Slice is giving away 100 free DOOM x CitizenM slices at 12pm.

news.title: Biffy Clyro announce Dublin and Belfast tour dates for next year
news.summary: About the tour, the band said: ‘It’s fucking time… The Futique Tour 2026’

news.title: The Ultras announce debut single and first headline show at Whelan’s
news.summary: The Dublin-based five piece will be supported by Delush and Further Line at Whelan's on Friday.

news.title: Remembering Frank Harte: "It’s really important that it stays current, and that the songs are sung – for the tradition, and for everybody"
news.summary: Marking the 20th anniversary of the death of the deeply influential singer and song collector Frank Harte, a special collection, When Adam Was In Paradise, has been re-released – curated by his daughter Orla, and engineered by Dónal Lunny. Here, Orla reflects on the album, and her father’s phenomenal legacy
